reviews.customers_say: Customers love this dress's style, with one noting it's perfect for both bra and no-bra wear. Customers appreciate its stretchiness, with one mentioning it accommodates all body types, and its thicker-than-expected material that remains breathable.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable, stunning dress!
items.body: To begin I’m 5’2 and 120lbs. 34B up top.. I first ordered a medium which was WAY too big. I then returned for this dress in apricot, size small. Better fitting, but the light color mixed with material shows the flaws. What you see pictured is the black in small. Likes- it’s flattering, forgiving, and soft. It was not a bad price for the quality of the dress. Not too thin and definitely not see through. It will be warm when I wear it to a baby shower in February(NJ). Dislikes- it’s still big. Especially in the midsection. But wearable. If they made it in XS I’d definitely size down. I typically wear a small-medium. Plenty of room for my big breasted friends or my big booty Judy’s. Unfortunately I don’t have either of those. Overall I love the dress. A bit bummed I can’t get it smaller to be more form fitting, but it was a great purchase and I’ll keep. Read more
items.author: Jessica Lee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish, Versatile, and Flattering!
items.body: I bought this dress for a work gala and wasn’t sure if the quality would meet the occasion, but I was pleasantly surprised! The dress fit very well, though I could have sized down due to the material’s stretch. The ribbing is a lovely touch, and the fabric is incredibly flattering. I felt confident and elegant at the gala, and the dress definitely suited the event. It’s versatile enough to dress up or down for various occasions. Highly recommend this dress for its quality, fit, and style! Read more
items.author: GS4

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute!
items.body: Love this dress! It has a nice thickness (but not super thick) to it where it kept me warm. It was a soft material. The stomach part it a little saggy but it doesn’t look horrible. Read more
items.author: Kali

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Whole Look—Classy, Comfy, and Compliment-Approved!
items.body: Love, love, love this dress! The only reason I’m giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is because I’ve been dropping a lil’ weight (okay, progress!) and found myself between sizes. So it fit a little loose under the bust. But baby, that wasn’t stopping nothing. I got creative, clipped the fabric together with a pearl clasp at the cutout, and turned it into a moment. Gave it this seamless, chic look that still let the original style shine. Cute and classy, period. The dress is giving simple luxury. It’s perfect for those early spring days when the sun is out but the breeze still has something to say. The fabric feels good on the skin, and that color contrast? A head-turner. I wore it to a baby shower and got compliments left and right—but don’t worry, I kept it respectful. The mama-to-be still had the spotlight… I just borrowed a lil’ glow from the side. If you’re looking for an effortlessly fabulous dress that you can wear as-is or dress up your way, this is that piece. Just keep the sizing in mind if you’re in between, but trust me—it’s worth the tiny tweak. This dress did what needed to be done! Read more
items.author: Bohemian_T

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect casual wedding guest dress
items.body: Ordered in a size medium and it fit perfectly. It’s comfortable, material is great, got so many compliments on it! For size reference I’m 5’5 160 pounds. Read more
items.author: Emily bailey

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Thin, see thru, not forgiving
items.body: Style is cute, but as expected it’s thin! Wrinkle, roll, crease…it’s all in display. Thought shapewear and the black color would help but you can see where that starts and tops too! Huge huge bummer. Read more
items.author: s

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality!
items.body: Okay this dress actually exceeded my expectations. As soon as I took it out of the package, I noticed the weight of the material and knew that it had to be good! I am typically a small or medium, but I scoured the reviews on the fit of this dress and went with a small and it fits absolutely perfect! I am 5’5 and 130 pounds for reference. The sleeves are the perfect length, as well as length of the dress. It is also a bit forgiving because of the good quality fabric. I’m definitely going to buy this in more colors! Read more
items.author: Laura Roberts

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute and comfortable!
items.body: Very stretchy and warm! I’m 5’5 127lbs and got a size small and it fit perfectly. Worn for a date night on Valentine’s Day and it was exactly what I was looking for! The sleeves are long and the dress goes to about my shins which is perfect for the cold weather. Read more
items.author: Rianne

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Khaki & Brown, Brown, Blue, Pink Purple, Apricot, Chocolate, Light Green, Black, Camel, Dark Green, Rose Red, Wine Red, Haze Blue, White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
